1.42.name: wordpress/zoolahscribe
1.42.description: This plugin allows creators of WordPress sites to put their content under the ZoolahScribe pay umbrella. Your readers get single sign-on and a creative mix of ways to pay for your blog. You get paid in dollars running micro-payment enabled subscription plans that can cost as little as a penny - or even nothing! Augment your CPM model with a "freemium" plan or tiered subscriptions. ZoolahScribe gives you the tools to create a subscription plan that lets you best monetize your work. Create your account, take the tutorial, contact our helpful staff, and get set up in minutes at http://ZoolahScribe.com.
